Clare Akamanzi bụ onye ọka iwu Rwanda, onye nchịkwa ọha na eze, onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye jere ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nchịk nke Rwanda Development Board, kemgbe ụbọchị 4 Febụwarị 2017. Ọnọdụ a bụ nhọpụta nke onye isi ala nke Rwanda. N'ime mgbanwe nke ụbọchị 31 Ọgọstụ 2017, Akamanzi nọgidere na kọmitii ma ọ nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ ya.
A mụrụ Akamanzi na Uganda n'aka nne na nna ya bụ ndị Rwanda gbara ọsọ ndụ n'afọ 1979. Ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne isii
Ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ tupu mahadum n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Uganda
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara ọtụtụ ebe, n'ihi na ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Uganda.
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee otu nwa
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Laws, nke Mahadum Makerere nyere, na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda
O nwekwara diplọma na Legal Practice, nke ọ nwetara na Law Development Centre, kwa na Kampala.
E nwetara Master of Laws ya na iwu azụmahịa na itinye ego na Mahadum Pretoria, na South Africa

O nwekwara nzere masta na Public Administration, nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Harvard, na Cambridge, Massachusetts, na United States. O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Iwu site na Mahadum Concordia n'afọ June 2018.
